category_scores.title: Clear roof and gutters of debris
Extend gutter downspouts away from the house
Use Class A fire-rated or Class 4 impact-resistant roofing
Use non-combustible fencing within five feet of the home
Trim tree branches and shrubs around the house
Grade the landscape to slope away from the foundation
Apply waterproof sealant to foundation walls
Create a non-flammable (e.g. gravel or stone) barrier around the foundation

recommendations.title: Install gutter guards
recommendations.description: Install guards to prevent leaves and debris from clogging gutters.
recommendations.explanation: Gutters are visible but do not appear to have guards installed, which can lead to clogging and water damage.

recommendations.title: Clear roof and gutters of debris
recommendations.description: Remove leaves, pine needles, and other flammable debris from the roof and gutters.
recommendations.explanation: There appears to be some debris on the roof that should be removed to reduce fire hazards.

recommendations.title: Reinforce the garage door
recommendations.description: Install a vertical bracing system or a wind-rated garage door.
recommendations.explanation: The garage door looks standard and may not have adequate reinforcement against severe weather.
